titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the gentry and commons of the county of Yorke presented to His Majesty at York, April 22. 1642. And His Majesties message sent to the Parliament, April 24. 1642. Concerning Sir Iohn Hothams refusall to give His Majestie entrance into Hull.
